name: _chart
description: Visualizes the provided table of data in the given chart type. Use this function to visually present data to the user.

chartType.description: The type of chart to produce.

rowLabels.description: The labels for the rows in the table. The length of this array must be equal to dimension of the table array.

columnLabels.description: The label for the data series in the table.

table.description: The series of numeric data values to visualize. The length of this array must be equal to dimension of the rowLabels array.
